name: Electric Love Potato Playlist Player
description:
Electric Love Potato Playlist Player is the latest in state of the art potatoware for music aficionados. It features a potato capable of playing music. This is the first ever potato that will perform pre-recorded music to you while you work, play, or sit before your computer blankly staring at your monitor and evaluating your life decisions.
Potato's AI is designed to provide intelligent companionship while you listen to your music. If you ever need a friend, Electric Love Potato Playlist Player is there for both you and your music.

Electric Love Potato Playlist Player supports all popular file types (with some exceptions and mixed results).
These include:

* .mp3
* .wav
* .m4a
* .mp4
* .ogg (ogg has been added for the imaginary Swedish person that asked for it.)

Electric Love Potato Playlist Player supports up to 12 songs at a time. This is the average length of an album. Meaning that your Potato Playlist Player can import an entire album of varying supported file types!
Potato also serves as a visualizer.


INSTRUCTIONS:

Drag your music onto the potato.
Potato will assemble a playlist based on an intelligent potaterAI algorithm.
Listen and enjoy!

- Some controls (such as play, stop, forward, and looping for one hit wonders) are provided.
- A Shhh! button has been incorporated to minimize the amount of enthusiasm potato exhibits while music is playing.
- No. Scrubbing is not, and will not, be supported. Unlike popular belief potatoes hate scrubbing. Potatoes want to be loved for their flaws, including dirt.


DISCLAIMER:

* None of these statements have been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration.
* Although there is no Linux version, Electric Love Potato is there in spirit.
* Electric Love Potato Playlist Player is guaranteed to work, for the most part, with mixed results, but probably not always.
